content.webTitle: When do polls close – and when are the mail-in ballot deadlines?

fields.headline: When do polls close – and when are the mail-in ballot deadlines?
fields.bodyText: Polling locations across the US will close late into the evening , but final results for several key states will rely on the arrival of mail-in ballots. In several states, mail-in ballot deadlines are days after election day, as long as the ballots have been postmarked on time – pushing the official results to later this week. Though this is both normal and legal, the thought of a delayed election result has a lot of people anxious. The Guardian put together a comprehensive timeline of mail-in ballot deadlines to chart out the final count.
